name: The Morton Chair
description: This contemporary take on a classic Art Deco design brings an understated cool and a modern-day elegance to the table with the Morton Chair. Innovative concentric arc geometry, alongside the splayed base, generous seat, and details, including buttons and subtle piping, bring a new dimension to a classic design. The satin dark tinted beech legs, gleam softly and flatter the bold statement seat, upholstered in fabric from Dominique Kieffer. The Morton can be upholstered in any luxury fabric or leather to suit a wide range of interiors.
